name: FleetBattle-PenandPaperBattleshipgame
0:
”Alexa, open Fleet Battle”
”Alexa, launch Fleet Battle”
”Alexa, begin Fleet Battle”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fleet battle
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This classic pen and paper game can now be played with Alexa. Alexa uses sophisticated Artificial Intelligence algorithms to shoot your ships just like another human player! 

This game will keep you engaged for a long time! 

What you'll need:
- Alexa device
- Pen and paper
- 10-15 minutes of your time

How it works
Open Fleet Battle and engage in a classic hit and miss game. Make sure you have a pen and paper prepared. Listen to Alexa's instructions. She'll tell you everything about the game: 
- How to draw the ocean grids
- How many and what type of ships you have
- How to play, step by step!

This skill offers premium content, in the form of subscription.
You can purchase the subscription which will enable you to play unlimited number of games daily. The subscription also gives you access to the Global Leaderboard - your score will be added to the list of Top 50 Players!

GLOBAL LEADERBOARD available here: https://fleet-battle-game.web.app/
Global leaderboard is available to Premium Subscribers only. It's updated in real-time. 

Are you ready to start the Fleet Battle?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
